product_description: Homogeneous Sheet Vinyl
price_adjustment_structure: Contact our sales specialists  for pricing
lead_time: 3 days for stocked products and 4 weeks for indent products
recyclable_percentage_description: The product is eligible to be collected and recycled through ARFA's Resi Loop program. ResiLoop is a product stewardship scheme designed to improve the recovery, reuse and recycling of resilient flooring consumed in Australia.
recycled_content_description: Installation waste and post-use material are collected through our global Second Life Program and re-integrated into manufacturing. In Australia, Gerflor is signatory of the ResiLoop program led by ARFA.
recycling_process_description: The product is designed to be deconstructed into granules which are then reintegrated into the composition of new Gerflor products.
reusable_description: Product is 100% recyclable as a whole.
end_of_life_program_description: Our global Second Life Program partners with installers and enables us to collect installation offcuts and End-of-life products after long years of use. The "clean" flooring (not glued) can be collected and delivered back to Gerflor facilities to get them recycled.
water_reduction_techniques: Yes. Water is 100% recycled and reused in the manufacturing facilities.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Consolidation of deliveries. Increased used of biofuel trucks, and expanding the use of multimodal transport. Gerflor joined the GRE21 program in 2022 to work effectively on the impact of freight and reduce its carbon footprint.
minimisation_design_strategy: Precise takeoff to maximise non-directional design pattern
factory_finished_description: The product's finish is Evercare™ a patented surface treatment technology by Gerflor that provides floor coverings with high chemical stain resistance, longevity and easy maintenance for high-traffic areas. No waxing or buffing is required. Evercare™ enables savings in water and detergent consumption.
specific_installation_methods: It can be recycled/reused/ easier without hardset adhesive.
type_of_packaging: Recycled cardboard wrapping

price_adjustment_structure: Contact our sales specialists for pricing
lead_time: 3 days for stocked colours and 12 weeks for indent colours.
recyclable_offcuts_description: Production offcuts from our plants and installation offcuts will be recycled. The Second Life program recovers offcuts from construction sites and installers, free of charge, and send them for recycling.
recycling_process_description: Product is eligible to be collected and recycled through ARFA's Resi Loop program. Resi Loop is a product stewardship scheme designed to improve the recovery, reuse and recycling of resilient flooring consumed in Australia
end_of_life_program_description: Our global Second Life Program partners with installers and enables us to collect installation offcuts and End-of-life products after long years of use. The "clean" flooring (not glued) can be collected and delivered back to Gerflor facilities to get them recycled. In Australia, Gerflor is signatory of the ResiLoop program led by ARFA.

minimisation_design_strategy: The product's pattern repeat and floor layout to maximise space and minimise installation offcuts and wastage
factory_finished_description: The product is equipped with triple-action Protecsol surface treatment. It is a patented technology applied to sports flooring products and is designed to enhance durability, facilitate easy maintenance and prevent burns from sliding friction in sports competition and recreation.

product_description: Wall protection for large surfaces in order to cover all parts exposed to impact.
price_adjustment_structure: Contact our sales specialists for pricing
lead_time: 3-5 days for stocked products and 16 weeks for indent products
recyclable_offcuts_description: Offcuts can be recycled and directly reintegrated into SPM products via a co-extrusion process.
recycling_process_description: The product is designed to be deconstructed into granules which are then reintegrated into the composition of new Gerflor products.
end_of_life_program_description: Gerflor is part of the recycling program called PVC Next. As part of the program, bonded deposits and laying falls can be collected and recycled in other sectors.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Gerflor joined the GRE21 program in 2022 to work effectively on the impact of freight and reduce its carbon footprint. Almost no empty returns from the lorries transporting the product to the worksites.
minimisation_design_strategy: We offer customers a pre-shipment cutting service or the manufacture of made-to-measure lengths (depending on the model). This factory pre-cutting avoids unnecessary waste on site and can be directly reintegrated into SPM products via a co-extrusion process.
factory_finished_description: Slightly textured and matte ("Hydr'X") finish surface hiding impacts and scratches, easy to clean.
type_of_packaging: cardboard box sealed with adhesive, wooden pallet

recycling_process_description: The product is designed to be deconstructed into granules which are then reintegrated into the composition of new Gerflor products.
end_of_life_program_description: Gerflor offers to take the end-of-life products directly from customers, recycling and reusing materials on new building materials.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Gerflor joined the GRE21 program in 2022 to work effectively on the impact of freight and reduce its carbon footprint. Almost no empty returns from the lorries transporting the product to the worksites.
minimisation_design_strategy: We offer customers a pre-shipment cutting service or the manufacture of made-to-measure lengths (depending on the model). This factory pre-cutting avoids unnecessary waste on site and can be directly reintegrated into SPM products via a co-extrusion process.
factory_finished_description: Slightly textured and matte ("Hydr'X" finish) hiding impacts and scratches, easy to clean.
type_of_packaging: Cardboard box sealed with adhesive, wooden pallet

product_description: Decorative panel with personalised digital printing
standard_dimensions: Maximum Height 1.2m x maximum length 2.9m x thickness 1mm
price_adjustment_structure: Contact our sales specialists for pricing
lead_time: 3-5 days for stocked products and 16 weeks for indent products
recyclable_offcuts_description: Offcuts can be recycled and directly reintegrated into SPM products via a co-extrusion process.
recycling_process_description: The product is designed to be deconstructed into granules which are then reintegrated into the composition of new Gerflor products.
end_of_life_program_description: Gerflor is part of the recycling program called PVC Next. As part of the program, bonded deposits and laying falls can be collected and recycled in other sectors.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Low sulfur diesel is used. Almost no empty returns from the lorries transporting the product to the worksites.
minimisation_design_strategy: We offer customers a pre-shipment cutting service or the manufacture of made-to-measure lengths (depending on the model). This factory pre-cutting avoids unnecessary waste on site and can be directly reintegrated into SPM products via a co-extrusion process.
factory_finished_description: Smooth and matte ("Hydr'X") finish surface hiding impacts and scratches, easy to clean.
type_of_packaging: cardboard box sealed with adhesive, wooden pallet
